DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate EC/TC ( epirubicin cyclophosphomide docetaxel cyclophosphomide ) EC/TC plus DBD ( Danggui Buxue Decoction ) adjuvant treatment breast cancer patient . The aim evaluate whether DBD decrease incidence grade 3/4 neutropenia induce EC/TC regimen chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Study Danggui Buxue Decoction Preventing Neutropenia
